name: Ambulance Emergency Simulation
description:
Hello, new case information is constantly coming from your radio, you should pick up the patient and take him to the Hospital as soon as possible.



We offer different Ambulance vehicles and a game with Arcade excitement that you can have fun with. Follow the targeted case information in the city, pick up the patient and take him to the hospital. While doing this, try to be the best Driver, because the center trusts you. Fulfill the duties of a real paramedic, feel what an ambulance driver means!


An Ambulance simulation that you can play without getting bored with more than 150 mission routes and different case scenarios in each mission.
If you get bored of doing only ambulance driver jobs, you should definitely try Parking and Stunt tracks modes, which are among the many content you can do with your Ambulance. Grow your career by completing the tracks consisting of fun and colorful road routes.



In the missions, you will sometimes catch up with the cases in the city center, enter the neighborhoods and solve the problems of the citizens, and sometimes you will try to reach your goal in the mountains and fields. At the beginning of each mission, you will encounter different scenarios and you will not get bored. Choose the right one from the Ambulance vehicles specially prepared for each terrain and start your mission. This city is counting on you!


If you get tired of the tasks and want to travel a bit, the Free Roam around the City option is for you. We designed the city model in the game so detailed and entertaining. We have equipped you with ramps, secret tunnels and surprises that you can fly over buildings on every corner, on every road, because we promised to entertain you. At the same time, you will feel yourself in the city with the Night and Day cycle in the game.

At the same time, the voiceovers that respond to the events you have done have been carefully prepared.

Additionally, in Ambulance parking mode, 10 different Ambulance parking maps are waiting for you.


Features:
  • Great and original city structure and design.
  • Different and colorful stunt tracks.
  • Ambulance parking mode.
  • Arcade and Simulation mix vehicle physics.
  • Fast gameplay.
  • Original content.
